config.title: codex tools
config.command: curl -fsSL https://github.com/HautechAI/codex-tools-mcp/releases/download/v0.1.0/codex-tools-mcp__linux_amd64.tar.gz -o codex-tools-mcp.tar.gz && tar -xzf codex-tools-mcp.tar.gz && chmod +x codex-tools-mcp && rm -f codex-tools-mcp.tar.gz && ./codex-tools-mcp
